ID: C1S5Y9E_00
From: Internal News <ONE.Chalhoub@chalhoub.com>
To: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2024-11-28 15:47
Subject: Performance Booster Month, Be Part of Our Tribute to the Region, Additional 25% at Etoile Outlet, HSBC Chief Economist Session, CEA, DYSON is now part of MUSE in Saudi Arabia, Job Opportunities & Blue Jacket Initiative
--------------------------------------------------
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/VWRptC9vtUCFxWUmDMWXVw/544502/4C7433AD8F37E0FA9D7A0F760761734E/top-banner-eng.png> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/VWRptC9vtUCFxWUmDMWXVw/550685/B27B3BFA68A23D2E77F789A64B721563/performance-management-end-of-year-2024.png> 	

Performance Booster Month has come to an end, and what an impactful journey it’s been!


With over 3,000 attendees, the sessions strongly resonated with participants, who described them as both insightful and impactful - a true reflection of the expertise shared by our speakers. The topics explored included feedback, year-end processes, effective conversations, and objective performance management.

Session recordings are now available on the Chalhoub University High Performing Teams – Learning Suite <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.onechalhoub.com%2Fredir%2Ft%3Fs%3Dhttps%253a%252f%252fchalhoubuniversity.com%252fenrol%252findex.php%253fid%253d3374%26t%3DU9SNiJg0GQTL7hVYOSWdyJuc%252fgGnWD4VMSwo7%252by4NfkA1kd2MqmJGffoONiqaUeTdgNvL4YBPB%252by%252fkAoxurgWeL0SuNEp2mCktXTMNEs%252fr5siI6v74aNAwKD4gNiIj1rLjC9fLBbWbzbbLfOdrHQ4qGPLnGOt48xy5W5rp8Z1VvXPcPjq4d787BLlpmpXD68OK5gW3h53zzXir8ACCXEH6vA9NbKMJrg%252b5xP55fuPkHTDOuRVYAKnyIGvMaB5uv80U4cw9angg4rScmSCVMGdmLnBMSmVjWQBu%252bpgHMo%252f422%252fac%252fWDqqKRaUnLgk140M&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C344c2961e93342bc694908dd0fa267e0%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638683912392625647%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=MWQcMTlK8X30frOjgNOFgaAry%2BWBYFuZLzfoZfryIgU%3D&reserved=0>  to help you stay motivated as we approach year-end!

chunks.text:
iOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=MWQcMTlK8X30frOjgNOFgaAry%2BWBYFuZLzfoZfryIgU%3D&reserved=0>  to help you stay motivated as we approach year-end!

Let’s build on this momentum to strengthen our performance and collaboration!

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/VWRptC9vtUCFxWUmDMWXVw/544604/EE7FE943EDA1E47370312F33479F3B3D/nuggets-03.png> 	

BE PART OF OUR TRIBUTE TO REGION

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/VWRptC9vtUCFxWUmDMWXVw/550690/7027AB3A1F168AD59CDE7FE869455A58/chalhoub-sports-day-14.gif> 	
This year, we are dedicating part of our upcoming 2024 Sustainability Report to honoring the resilience and strength of the people in Bilad Al Sham (Levantine region). Alongside this tribute to resilience, we celebrate the rich beauty and vibrant life of the region through a curated collection of archival and recent photographs from the region.

Share your favorite high-quality photos that highlight the charm of Bilad Al Sham. The best ones will be featured in our 2024 Sustainability Report!

Steps to Participate:
1. Choose a beautiful nature or cultural photo that was taken by YOU in Palestine, Lebanon, Syria, & Jordan.
2. Ensure the image you choose does not include people.
3. Post your image on One Chalhoub, <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.onechalhoub.com%2Fredir%2Ft%3Fs%3Dhttps%253a%252f%252fonechalhoub.connexionsnow.com%252f%26t%3DU9SNiJg0GQTL7hVYOSWdyJuc%252fgGnWD4VMSwo7%252by4NfkA1kd2MqmJGffoONiqaUeTdgNvL4YBPB%252by%252fkAoxurgWeL0SuNEp2mCktXTMNEs%252fr5siI6v74aNAwKD4gNiIj1rLjC9fLBbWbzbbLfOdrHQ4qGPLnGOt48xy5W5rp8Z1VvXPcPjq4d787BLlpmpXD68OK5gW3h53zzXir8ACCXEH6vA9NbKMJrg%252b5xP55fuPkHTDOuRVYAKnyIGvMaB5uv80U4cw9angg4rScmSCVMGdmLnBMSmVjWQBu%252bpgHMo%252f422%252fac%252fWDqqKRaUnLgk140M&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C344c2961e93342bc694908dd0fa267e0%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638683912392865208%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=Hl3nUhRzoac784oBOX9EUJAIrKDWkIED7PNny8MviwM%3D&reserved=0> with the Hashtag #TributeToOurRegion 
4.

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/VWRptC9vtUCFxWUmDMWXVw/544518/EA5451AEC8C1A8A08E231DEEFE8086E5/nuggets-10.png> 	

ADDITIONAL 25% AT ETOILE OUTLET

Enjoy an additional 25% off on final sale prices at the Etoile Outlet Village.

Present your Chalhoub Group employee ID from November 29th to December 31st.

*T&C apply

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/VWRptC9vtUCFxWUmDMWXVw/550683/ED63DD5DD2E20BC7356F8A4FCE2C652C/staff-outlet-discount1.jpg> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/VWRptC9vtUCFxWUmDMWXVw/545351/0FD2B4FFF3F296B5E7AA9375FE77A144/nuggets-14.png> 	

HSBC CHIEF ECONOMIST SESSION AT THE GREENHOUSE

Last week, the Group hosted a HSBC Chief Economist session at The Greenhouse. The event brought together leaders from our Finance, Investments & Strategy teams for an insightful and interactive discussion with HSBC’s Chief Economists, exploring a broad range of topics aligned with our strategic plans and core business objectives.

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/VWRptC9vtUCFxWUmDMWXVw/550684/F1C235D8AFEA4194DD29670353D17EBD/nbg8e317c5c384fdf4cda48a57062809aeb274922723.jpeg> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/VWRptC9vtUCFxWUmDMWXVw/549433/3313A052F911679EB07CAA448C355A00/untitled-design-55.png> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/VWRptC9vtUCFxWUmDMWXVw/550525/3AF3B0965BF3029B5782FDA1214A75F7/banner-43.png> 	
Nominations for the Chalhoub Excellence Awards (CEA) are now open until December 6th.

ob.core.windows.net/public-media/VWRptC9vtUCFxWUmDMWXVw/550525/3AF3B0965BF3029B5782FDA1214A75F7/banner-43.png> 	
Nominations for the Chalhoub Excellence Awards (CEA) are now open until December 6th.

This is your your chance to recognise and celebrate the remarkable contributions of a team, a project, or a leader who has truly made a difference.With seven inspiring categories - Sustainability, Collaboration, Customer Focus, Servant Leadership, Innovation, Excellence, and Diversity & Inclusion—you can highlight the achievements that truly stand out.

NOMINATE NOW

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/VWRptC9vtUCFxWUmDMWXVw/549433/3313A052F911679EB07CAA448C355A00/untitled-design-55.png> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/VWRptC9vtUCFxWUmDMWXVw/545221/DC5F2CE02EA935810A44A2412CF9C4D3/nuggets-42.png> 	

DYSON IS NOW PART OF MUSE IN SAUDI ARABIA

Big News! MUSE members in Saudi Arabia can now collect and redeem points with our latest brand partner: DYSON. From world-renowned hair care innovations to cutting-edge home appliances, DYSON perfectly blends style and performance. Discover the latest collections at Red Sea Mall Jeddah & Nakheel Mall Riyadh.  

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/VWRptC9vtUCFxWUmDMWXVw/550688/3F1723D339E8F221F029ED26841D53B0/muse-x-dyson.jpg> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/VWRptC9vtUCFxWUmDMWXVw/545238/B7C824A7C2CA753E9218C7833A4A2964/nuggets-27.png>

THE BLUE JACKET INITIATIVE IN EGYPT 

In collaboration with Resala Charity Organisation, our Egypt team successfully organised a Blue Jacket Initiative. With this initiative, we distributed 160 jackets to children in need. 

Thank you to all our volunteers who dedicated their time and efforts to make this initiative a success. Let's continue to create impact together!

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/VWRptC9vtUCFxWUmDMWXVw/550689/AF0461E18A68B4E0A72044850272919D/copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-internal-news-64.gif> 	
For inquiries, please get in touch with us at Internal.Communications@chalhoub.com and to share your news in the Internal News please contact Yasmine.Uthman@chalhoub.com
